titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 70th anniversary of Ellsworth Air Force Base.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/16/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the contributions of Ellsworth Air Force Base (South Dakota) to the security of the United States. Commemorates 70 years of excellence and service by such Base. Encourages the people of the United States to recognize and honor the dedicated and exemplary service of the airmen stationed at such Base, past and present, and their families.
